mapper.select: select * from Users where user_id=#{user_id} and is_deleted=0
mapper.update: update Users set password=#{password} where user_id=#{user_id}
update Users set is_deleted = 1 where user_id=#{user_id}
UPDATE users SET bio = #{bio} WHERE user_id = #{user_id}
UPDATE users SET profile_image = #{profile_image} WHERE user_id = #{user_id}

mapper.select: select * from Users where user_id=#{user_id} and is_deleted=0
mapper.update: update Users set password=#{password} where user_id=#{user_id}
update Users set is_deleted = 1 where user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.select: select * from Users where email=#{email} and is_deleted=0
